Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

Post.title: bootloader
Post._content:
## Boot Rom

![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Cooper1896/MyPic/68b1859c50416_1756464540.webp)

<center></center>

PBL(Primary Boot Loader)CPU(ROM)Boot Rom[^1](,CPU)SBL(Secondary Boot Loader)SRAMRoot of trustSBL

---

## PBL(XBLSBL)

Bootloader

```
Boot Mode->
(UFS,USB,eMMC,NAND)->
->
(RSA+SHA-256)->
    SBL  
    Download Mode
```

PBL:

- (**Signature Verification**)
  
  -  Next-stage Bootloader (SBL/XBL) OEM Key

- (**Rollback Protection**)
  
  - eFuse
    eFusePBL

- (EDL/Download Mode)
  
  - OEM Mi AuthSamsung KNOXPBL  PC  OEM  Token
  - PCToken()

OEM/

(FastbootMiFlash)PBL

BootloaderROM

### PBLBootloader

BootloadereFuse/OTP(One-Time Programmable Memory)PBL(Fuse Bits)

:

- `BOOT_UNLOCK`:(0 = Locked, 1 = Unlocked)
- `OEM_KEY_HASH`:
- `ANTI-ROLLBACK_VER`:  eFuse

#### Bootloader

 Android + Qualcomm SoC 

1. `fastboot oem unlock`
2. Fastboot **Secondary BootloaderSBL/XBL**
3. SBL/XBL **Qualcomm Secure Execution EnvironmentQSEE, TrustZone**
4. QSEE **PBL **OEM `BOOT_UNLOCK=1`
5.  PBL  OEM Key 

:::note
PBL Fuse Bit
:::

---

## 

:

> /10


**Samsung Knox**

### Samsung Knox

#### 

Bootloader:

1. **Download Mode** OEM Unlock 

2.  SBL ABL Bootloader  TrustZone Secure Monitor **SMCSecure Monitor Call**
   
   ```c
   `smc_call(SMC_CMD_BLOW_FUSE, KNOX_WARRANTY_BIT_ID);`
   ```

3. TrustZone TZSW**eFuse Controller**

4. **VPP **

5. /

6.  0  1

7. LatchBoot ROM 

....
- Samsung Pay/Samsung Pass 
- 
- 
  ...


:::note
 SoC  LOCK/UNLOCK
:::

:::important
Samsung
:::

end~

[^1]: Boot RomSoCMask Rom
